### Government Tender Announcement
#### RFQu No. 2023-15012

The Department of Defense Research and Development Canada (DRDC) invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit a financial proposal for a requisitioned item under Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI. The procurement involves the purchase of a single UPRIGHT/INVERT BRIGHTFIELD/FLUORESCENCE MICROSCOPE along with its components and accessories.

#### Related Notice
Reference No. cb-8462-94190659 (RFQu No. 2023-15012) - Amendment No. 1

#### Required Item
Item Description: UPRIGHT/INVERT BRIGHTFIELD/FLUORESCENCE MICROSCOPE
Quantity: 1

The required item includes various components such as:
- Fluorescence filters (DAPI, FITC, TxRed, and Cy5)
- Objectives (4x, 10x, 20x, and 40x)
- ELWD Universal Condenser (NA 0.3 WD 73mm)
- Stage inserts (30 mm diameter cut out for viewing, microscope slides, 35 mm, and 60 mm petri dishes)
- Revolution control joystick
- Cable assembly (joystick external)
- Revolution multi-Well Points Module

#### Acquisition Requirements
The DRDC is seeking a supplier that can deliver the UPRIGHT/INVERT BRIGHTFIELD/FLUORESCENCE MICROSCOPE within a time frame that meets the government's contractual requirements. The procurement also requires on-site installation and training.

#### Contract Duration
The contract period will be from the contract award date to one year following the date of delivery and acceptance.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The selection of the successful bidder will be based on a combined evaluation of prices and technical criteria. Suppliers that meet the mandatory technical criteria and have the lowest aggregate price will be considered for contract award.

#### Additional Requirements
This procurement is restricted to suppliers that are currently pre-qualified under Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI. Suppliers must submit a response to the solicitation document to access the RFQu Number details.
